Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Northbound Reroute near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago
ShortDescription: Northbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt and Chestnut: near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt, Chestnut and over regular route: due to police activity near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/127th
ShortDescription: Southbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th and Vermont: due to street blockage near Halsted/127th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th, Vermont and over regular route: due to street blockage near Halsted/127th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute near Central/North
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses temp. rerouted SB: Central, North, Austin, Division and Central due to street blockage near Central/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Central/North, due to street blockage near Central/North.

Southbound #85 Central buses will operate via Central, North, Austin, Division, Central and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
